snippet.title: Imaginary Friends Final Trailer
snippet.description:
Downlad the game for free from these sites:

https://mannytsu.itch.io/imaginary-friends
https://rpgmaker.net/games/6912/
http://gamejolt.com/games/imaginary-friends/145067

Imaginary Friends is a RPG Maker horror game. The story is about 14-year-old Hailey who has spent her entire summer vacation alone in her room. Her mother wants her to go outside and spent time with her friends, but the problem is, she doesn’t have any. That is about to change soon when Hailey finds herself in an imaginary world. With the help of a mysterious young boy with red cap, she has to confront her childhood and herself. 

More about the game on it's development blog: http://mannytsusgames.tumblr.com/

Original music by Isoteric: https://soundcloud.com/isoteric
